scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server:start
scripts.start:dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.server:build: cd server && npm install && npm run build
scripts.server:start: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.client:dev: cd Client && npm install && npm run dev
scripts.client:build: cd Client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
